companies.name: Rebellions
companies.reason: Rebellions launched the Rebel-Quad chip, marking its presence as a notable competitor to Nvidia in the AI chip industry. The startup is focusing on offering competitive alternatives for AI applications amidst rising demand.

companies.name: Tukki
companies.reason: This immigration technology startup gained attention by winning a $1 million prize in a competition, showcasing its innovative solutions within the immigration tech sector, which addresses a critical and current need.
